data.quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
data.author: Mahatma Gandhi

data.quote: Each misfortune you encounter will carry in it the seed of tomorrows good luck.
data.author: Og Mandino

data.quote: To forgive is to set a prisoner free and realize that prisoner was you.
data.author: Lewis B. Smedes

data.quote: In separateness lies the world's great misery, in compassion lies the world's true strength.
data.author: Buddha

data.quote: By believing passionately in something that does not yet exist, we create it.
data.author: Nikos Kazantzakis

data.quote: All the great performers I have worked with are fuelled by a personal dream.
data.author: John Eliot

data.quote: One of the advantages of being disorderly is that one is constantly making exciting discoveries.
data.author: A. A. Milne

data.quote: I never see what has been done; I only see what remains to be done.
data.author: Marie Curie

data.quote: Begin at once to live and count each separate day as a separate life.
data.author: Seneca

data.quote: If you don't know where you are going, you will probably end up somewhere else.
data.author: Lawrence Peter

data.quote: It is not so important to know everything as to appreciate what we learn.
data.author: Hannah More

data.quote: The bird of paradise alights only upon the hand that does not grasp.
data.author: John Berry

data.quote: Think as a wise man but communicate in the language of the people.
data.author: William Yeats

data.quote: Practice yourself, for heavens sake in little things, and then proceed to greater.
data.author: Epictetus

data.quote: If one does not know to which port is sailing, no wind is favorable.
data.author: Seneca

data.quote: To be upset over what you don't have is to waste what you do have.
data.author: Ken S. Keyes

data.quote: If we did the things we are capable of, we would astound ourselves.
data.author: Thomas Edison

data.quote: Nothing in life is to be feared. It is only to be understood.
data.author: Marie Curie

data.quote: Successful people ask better questions, and as a result, they get better answers.
data.author: Tony Robbins

data.quote: Life is a process. We are a process. The universe is a process.
data.author: Anne Schaef

data.quote: I think somehow we learn who we really are and then live with that decision.
data.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

data.quote: We learn what we have said from those who listen to our speaking.
data.author: Kenneth Patton

data.quote: A little knowledge that acts is worth infinitely more than much knowledge that is idle.
data.author: Kahlil Gibran

data.quote: The doors we open and close each day decide the lives we live.
data.author: Flora Whittemore

data.quote: The worst bankrupt in the world is the person who has lost his enthusiasm.
data.author: H. W. Arnold

data.quote: Happiness comes when your work and words are of benefit to yourself and others.
data.author: Buddha

data.quote: Everything is perfect in the universe even your desire to improve it.
data.author: Wayne Dyer

data.quote: The universe is full of magical things, patiently waiting for our wits to grow sharper.
data.author: Eden Phillpotts
